title: MNF Recap, Top Position Groups & Nike’s Ryan Flaherty
itunes:title: MNF Recap, Top Position Groups & Nike’s Ryan Flaherty
description:
DJ and Bucky recap the Texans 34-17 win over the Titans on Monday Night (1:10), the guys also break down the top position groups in the NFL (7:00). Ryan Flaherty, Senior Director of Performance at Nike, joins DJ & Bucky to talk about his training philosophy and his relationship with current NFL stars (12:50), and wrap with a college football discussion, including early entrants and new coaching hires (32:24).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
